Class MenuUtils

java.lang.Object
  com.agilent.labs.hyperedge.impl.utils.MenuUtils

public class MenuUtils
extends java.lang.Object

Various menu utilities for finding, adding, and removing menus and menu items.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Michael L. Creech

Method Detail

addSeparator

public static boolean addSeparator(java.lang.String menu_name,
                                   javax.swing.JMenuBar menu_bar)
Add a separator to a menu with a given name, if it exists.

Parameters:
menu_name - non-null name of the menu to which to add a separator.
menu_bar - the JMenuBar to search within. May be null.
Returns:
true if a separator was added. false otherwise.

addMenuWhenNecessary

public static javax.swing.JMenu addMenuWhenNecessary(java.lang.String menu_name,
                                                     javax.swing.JMenuBar menu_bar)
Return a JMenu with a given name. If it doesn't exist on the JMenuBar, then create it and add it to the menu bar.

Parameters:
menu_name - non-null name of the menu to find or create.
menu_bar - the JMenuBar to search within. May be null.

getMenu

public static javax.swing.JMenu getMenu(java.lang.String menu_name,
                                        javax.swing.JMenuBar menu_bar)
Return a JMenu with a given name. If it doesn't exist on the JMenuBar, then create it.

Parameters:
menu_name - non-null name of the menu to find or create.
menu_bar - the JMenuBar to search within. May be null.

findMenu

public static javax.swing.JMenu findMenu(java.lang.String menu_name,
                                         javax.swing.JMenuBar menu_bar)
Return The JMenu with a given name that exists on a given JMenuBar.

Parameters:
menu_name - non-null name of the menu to find.
menu_bar - the JMenuBar to search within. May be null.

findMenuItem

public static javax.swing.JMenuItem findMenuItem(java.lang.String menu_item_name,
                                                 javax.swing.JMenu menu)
Return The JMenuItem with a given name that exists on a given JMenu.

Parameters:
menu_item_name - non-null name of the JMenuItem to find.
menu - the JMenu to search within. May be null.

removeMenu

public static javax.swing.JMenu removeMenu(java.lang.String menu_name,
                                           javax.swing.JMenuBar menu_bar)
Remove a JMenu with a given name that exists on a given JMenuBar.

Parameters:
menu_name - non-null name of the JMenu to find.
menu_bar - the JMenuBar to search within. May be null.
Returns:
the JMenu that was removed, null if not found or the menu_bar is null.

removeMenuItem

public static javax.swing.JMenuItem removeMenuItem(java.lang.String menu_item_name,
                                                   javax.swing.JMenu menu)
Remove a JMenuItem with a given name that exists on a given JMenu.

Parameters:
menu_item_name - non-null name of the JMenuItem to find.
menu - the JMenu to search within. May be null.
Returns:
the JMenuItem that was removed, null if not found or the menu is null.

addItem

public static boolean addItem(java.awt.Component to_add,
                              java.awt.Component match,
                              javax.swing.JMenu menu,
                              boolean add_before)
Add a Component after a given other Component within a menu. This is usually a JMenuItem or JSeparator

Parameters:
to_add - the Component to add to this menu. It is usually a JMenuItem or JSeparator.
match - the Component in which to add to_add before or after. It is usually a JMenuItem or JSeparator.
menu - the JMenu in which the addition is to take place.
add_before - if true, to_add is added before match. If false, to_add is added after match.
